en.av_c1: Here is an example showing insertion at the end of the list. 15 is the value to be inserted.
en.av_c3: Copy current.element() to the new node (this value is null).
en.av_c4: The next field for the new node is assigned to point to what curr.next() points to (which is null).
en.av_c5: curr's next field is assigned to point to the new link node.
en.av_c6: The value of the current node is set to 15.
en.av_c9: Inserting into the empty list is similar to inserting at the end of the list. Here 15 is again being inserted.
en.av_c11: Copy current.element() to the new node, which is null.
en.av_c12: The next field for the new node is assigned to point to what curr.next() points to (which is null).
en.av_c13: curr.next() is assigned to point to the new link node.
en.av_c14: The value of the current node is set to 15.
